name: Resume App
description:
Right now you are using Resume App. 
This app presents my Resume in Android Application form. App is entirely designed and written by me. I used Kotlin and Android Architecture Components to develop this application. You can grab a source code from my github.

name: Baby Pacifier
description: App was entirely designed and developed by me. It was created when my son was 3months old and had a very bad time. This app helped him to calm down. I consider BabyPacifier as my most important and favorite app as this was very crucial to my other projects. It works for bad days of my son even now, when he is 1 year old.

name: Dobre Programy
description: I started develop this app from scratch to release as an only Android Developer.

name: Just count it!
description: Simple counter app made in ReactNative.
